channel.title: Drip-Irrigation on PKYDRIP
channel.description: Recent content in Drip-Irrigation on PKYDRIP

item.title: Drip Irrigation Solution for 10 Hectares of Coconut Trees
item.description: In the vast land of Brazil, 10 hectares of flat fertile land breeds 2050 young coconut trees full of hope. In order to make these lives thrive, a highly innovative and scientific irrigation plan has made a stunning debut.
